context: I want to buy this game but it says 3Ds, is it eligible with a regular DS or just 3Ds
response: Nintendo 3DS games can be played with a Nintendo 3DS, a 3DS XL (bigger screens) or a Nintendo 2DS (same technical "guts" as the 3DS, but no 3D capabilities and it doesn't fold in half).  This game will NOT play on any of the "original" DS systems (the ones without a number preceding "DS").

response: Yes, you can.  See http://www.officedepot.com/a/products/100753/H-R-Block-At-Home-2012/ (only one of several ads and reviews that specifically state this).

context: does this game works on windows 7 or 8?
response: Yes, in either 32 or 64 bit versions.

context: Does VOIP also work with Teamspeak?
response: I use this headset with Vent, Teamspeak, Mumble, RazorComms and others. Not sure if that answers your question. If not, please be more specific.

context: Can you use the cable to connect to a windows PC?
response: Microsoft promised controller support for Windows 8 in late 2014. So keep trying and it will eventually work. http://support.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-one/accessories/controller-pc-compatibility If you can't get it to work try the drivers from the link.

context: Are these capable of using USB for a PC hookup or are they the green/pink cables?
response: you can use usb.  the mixamp is it's own sound card.

context: Does this headset require batteries or charging? It's not wireless, right? So if it's wired I don't need to worry? Ugh, sorry :(
response: No the only wire is from the headset to the controller. It uses the controllers power. If you're expecting good surround sound do NOT choose this headset. I have a turtle beach for Xbox 360 that I bought in 2007 that blows this headset away. I'm still somewhat angry about purchasing this headset.

context: Does it have 2 player mode, i mean can 2 players play with two controllers at the same time, on same ps4 (i dont mean online)
response: Yes.  You are able to play with two characters and a third in tow, allowing one of you to switch to that third character depending on the task to be completed.

context: Will this controller work on windows 8.1? I am wanting a controller for Watch Dogs.
response: It worked fine on Windows 8 for me. Make sure Watch Dogs has controller support though first, which it should considering it's a console port. If not, download Xpadder to map the buttons.

context: does it come with guitar?
response: Rocksmith comes with a lead to plug in to your own guitar and your game system.

context: Which expansion packs does it include ? Does it have Apartment life ?
response: The Sims: Complete Collection includes: Livin' Large, Hot Date, Superstar, Makin' Magic, House Party, Vacation, Unleashed, and of course the base game. The Sims Apartment Life is part of the Sims 2 games.

context: Is this thinner than the F710? I like the F710 but it feels a little too bulky for my comfort due to the battery pack. Thanks in advance!
response: I do not own a F710, but this model doesn't have a battery pack. Thus, it stands to reason that it would be thinner and lighter by default

context: Does this work on the Nintendo DS XL?
response: It will not work on a regular Nintendo DS or Nintendo DS XL, it only works on Nintendo 3DS, 3DS XL, or the Nintendo 2DS systems.

context: If you switch it to English language can you play American game So?
response: Yes, I can still play english games on this handheld. Only thing i noticed that was different was the controls on the main menu are different ( like to enter the game). Awesome looking system though. Would recommend getting a clear case to protect the system.

context: Does this work well under Windows 8.1?
response: I've used in the entire time on 8.1 and haven't had any problems

context: does it work under Windows 8.1?
response: While I had the choice to select the driver that came with Windows 8, this driver had an error 10 from the device. Instead, I used a 2009 Windows 7 driver from the Microsoft site and this worked.

context: so I just bought the Gembonics Battery Back up -  how do you recharge the unit to a full charge ?
response: The Gembonics charger comes with a 3-in-1 cable which includes micro USB port so you can just use that to charge it by using your wall adapter or Alternatively you can connect it to the computer or laptop USB port.

context: The only thought that I have for this keyboard is how are the LEDs?
response: Corsair still has problems with their backlighting, do not recommend buying.

context: Which gaming system is this pack compatible with?
response: I believe it's not system specific. As long as you have a portal and skylanders giants it should be fine. My son uses it on Wii.

context: What does "Bulk Packaging" means? Why is it cheaper?Whats the diference with the other SD card? If any.Thanks
response: Nothing at all. You are not paying for all the non-recyclable plastic waste for individual unit packaging.

context: Just Dance Nintendo is Ok to use with regulat TV?
response: Yes as long as all of the wires fit into that specific t.v it's fine. Enjoy!

context: Do you need any extra cords or items to use with xbox 360
response: no actually I've been trying to get in touch with you guys because the mic does not work what can I do about that

context: Is it usable in the left hsnd?
response: I have on rare occasions used mine left handed when my right arm wanted a break, however, it is definitely right handed.  I used mine only for directional and speed control, if you needed to use it and all the buttons, right handed would be definitely the way to go.

context: it does come with the pedals, right?
response: it comes with auto clutch. hit lb rb and a at the same time to engage it. then you are driving with clutch, but you don't hit the a button after you start the race. very easy to use.

context: When I click on the Desktop icon to play The Titans Expansion it says "please enter The Titans Expansion CD ROM. Any advice on what to do?
response: Put the game in your CD tray. It may need to download something to your computer

context: What kind of plug does this have? I'm looking for s USB controller.
response: Yes it's a USB & plugs directly into PS3s existing USB ports.

context: Does this count as a dual shock 3 controller?
response: I dont think so it does work with play station and has all the functionality as one but id xbox formatted it is a great controller

context: Just ararived and does not work at all. tried several computers, not a problem on my end, the mouse is dead. unless there is some secret magic dance..
response: It should work right out of the box.  There's an on/off switch on the bottom of the mouse for the lights but if the mouse is not working at all then you may need to return it, hopefully you can.

context: does it comes with its own gamepad software?
response: Yeah,it installs some crazyness automatically..i think it was auto,don't remember. key mapping n such,but it crashes when you even just click on the vibration settings.

context: Can any serious gamer here comment on how flawless the sensor in this mouse is? Any (even slight) positive/negative acceleration, angle snapping, etc?
response: To me after about a years worth of heavy use on the mouse the sensor is starting to become a bit poor on accuracy and will sometimes skip a bit.

context: I have Swap force already...do i need to buy the starter kit for dark edition game or do I just need the game??
response: Dark edition is a starter kit and comes with the base and game plus 5 dark edition skylanders.
